#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<limits.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>

#define MIN(X,Y) (X<Y)?(X):(Y);
#define MAX(X,Y) (X>Y)?(X):(Y);

#define LIM 1000002

double fact[LIM];


inline void scan_f(int *a)
{
    char c = 0;
    while(c<33)
        //c = fgetc_unlocked(stdin);
        c = getc(stdin);
    *a = 0;
    while(c>33)
        {
            *a = (*a)*10 + c - '0';
    //c = fgetc_unlocked(stdin);
    c = getc(stdin);
    }
}

void calcfact(){
    fact[0]=0;
    for(int i=1;i<LIM;i++){
        fact[i]=fact[i-1]+log(i);
    }
}

int main(){

    int t;
    scan_f(&t);
    int n,k,times;
    double temp,ans,den;
    calcfact();
    while(t--){
        scan_f(&n);
        scan_f(&k);
        times=MIN(k,n-k);
        den=(n-1)*log(2);
        ans=0;
        for(int i=0;i<=times;i++){
            temp=exp(fact[n]-fact[i]-fact[n-i]-den);
            ans+=temp;
        }
        ans*=100;
        printf("%.1lf\n",ans);
    }
    
    return 0;
}
